description:
Search and shop the web fast with Search Joy. Type your search term(s) in the upper text box and press the button of the website your want to search. Voila! The browser opens and the results will be there. It's that easy. Search Joy clears the text box and makes searching all day a joy. Most popular website are there for the searching. Also we've included a url launcher. Type your website addresses and hit Go. See the screenshots and the list below for all the websites included:

Google
Amazon
Wikipedia
YouTube
eBay
Dictionary
Bing
IMDB
Google Images
Google Translate
Google I'm Feeling Lucky
Wunderground
Urbandictionary
Merriam Webster
Packagetrackr
Yahoo Finance
Bing Products
MarketWatch Stock Quotes
Google Shoppping
Google News
Scroogle
IXQuick
DuckDuckGo - default search
Yahoo
Yellow Pages
Wall Street Journal
New York Times

and many more...

Also, make a QR Code right from Search Joy. Type the information you want to show and press the button. Shorten urls too. Hit one of the four function buttons on the bottom for the time or to get useful local information using your geolocation. GeoNames.org seamlessly provides zip code look up.

Search fast, search easy, search joyfully all day with Search Joy.
